channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billionaire MacKenzie Scott extends her philanthropy with a $17 million gift to Oklahoma’s oldest public community college, where most students rely on aid
item.description: MacKenzie Scott is continuing her giving streak to colleges, this time with a $17 million “life-changing” donation to Northern Oklahoma College.

item.title: 7 Movies To Watch This Week Before They Leave Netflix For Good
item.description: Don't miss these great movies before they leave Netflix at the end of November.

item.title: Pope Leo warns Gen Z and Gen Alpha that using AI too much could stunt their personal and career growth: ‘Don’t ask it to do your homework’
item.description: As Gen Z turns to ChatGPT en masse, the pope is sounding the alarm about the erosion of critical thinking skills.

item.title: You Just Missed The Best iPhone 17 Black Friday Deal Of 2025
item.description: The best iPhone 17 Pro Max Black Friday 2025 discount is gone. What are the best remaining options for Apple Black Friday deal hunters?

item.title: Study Explains Why Some Volcanoes Explode and Others Don’t
item.description: Researchers have simulated how magma moves, providing a new explanation for how it erupts to the surface.

item.title: In The Future We’ll All Be Bosses And Have 100 Artificial Assistants
item.description: Do you want to be a boss? In the near future, your team will likely be AI agents that you sent tasks to, get work from, and manage in their own autono...

item.title: Novo Nordisk stock trades at 4-year-low on the back of disappointing Alzheimer’s trial
item.description: The stock of the Wegovy and Ozempic maker is down nearly 50% year to date.

item.title: Syfe CEO: Fintech founders need to focus on trust if the sector is to reach its full potential
item.description: The question isn't whether fintech can disrupt. It’s whether fintech can build enough trust to manage and move the world’s money,

item.title: Why your 401(k) is safe from a 40% crash in stocks—but not a 10% to 15% correction, top analyst says
item.description: "It would be kind of shocking if you didn't have some kind of profit-taking correction in 2026 at some point on the order of 10% to 15%."

item.title: These Are The Best Black Friday 2025 New-Car Deals
item.description: Incentives as rich as $17,000 cash and 0.0% financing make Thanksgiving week a terrific time to shop for a new car, truck or SUV.

item.title: Trump's $2K tariff dividends could carry a hefty price tag
item.description: Trump's $2,000 tariff dividend plan could cost $600 billion annually, far exceeding current tariff revenues of $300 billion per year, budget watchdog ...

item.title: Middle-income Americans pessimistic about their financial future amid persistent inflation, analysis shows
item.description: Study reveals only 21% of middle-income Americans expect better finances next year, down from 33% in 2020, as inflation creates widespread pessimism.

item.title: Voters express economic worries over inflation as costs rise, Fox News poll finds
item.description: A Fox News poll shows 76% of voters view the economy negatively, with 61% disapproving of President Donald Trump's economic handling amid rising costs...

item.title: DEI consultant resigns from Cracker Barrel board after heated proxy fight
item.description: Cracker Barrel shareholders backed nine of 10 board nominees, including CEO Julie Felss Masino.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
